entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northeast 20 near midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind north 20 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 21 February 2023
